item.description:
Hello All,





Happy Holidays to all!!!

Please take a moment to read the complete update below.... Happy New Year, Best wishes to all for a happy and healthy new year. Our January meetup will be held at Doggie Day Playcenter at 1PM, Tremont Street (South End) Boston.
Don't forget if you need to re-stock on pet food or just want to spoil your little one, as a courtesy, Doggie Day offers all Chi members who attend the meetup 20% off everything on the day of our meetup.

Please Note:
There is some free parking located behind Doggieday Playcenter and the CVS, for non-residents of the area there are also plenty of metered spots near DoggieDay located on Tremont street as well as "South End visitor parking spots" located on each end of the street in the South end . Although those may be harder to come by.

Stay well....ST




DOGGIE DAY PLAYCENTER ( 400 Tremont Street, South end, Boston,02116 ...our usual location 1:00PM ONLY!
http://www.doggieday....
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua January Meetup
